mapper.sql: select d.version,org.org_name,d.org_id,d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.dr, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d join sys_org org on d.org_id=org.org_id
mapper.select: select d.dept_id, d.parent_id from sys_dept d left join sys_role_dept rd on d.dept_id = rd.dept_id where rd.role_id = #{roleId} and d.dept_id not in (select d.parent_id from sys_dept d inner join sys_role_dept rd on d.dept_id = rd.dept_id and rd.role_id = #{roleId}) order by d.parent_id, d.order_num
select count(1) from sys_user where dept_id = #{deptId} and dr = 0
select count(1) from sys_dept where dr = 0 and parent_id = #{deptId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dept( dept_id, org_id, parent_id, dept_name, order_num, leader, phone, email, status, version, create_by, create_time )values( #{deptId}, #{orgId}, #{parentId}, #{deptName}, #{orderNum}, #{leader}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{status}, #{version}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.update:
update sys_dept
version = version+1, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = sysdate()
where find_in_set(dept_id,queryDeptParentList(#{deptId}))
mapper.delete: update sys_dept set dr = 1,version = version+1 where dept_id = #{deptId}
